org.apache.flink.yarn.configuration

类 YarnConfigOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.yarn.configuration.YarnConfigOptions

  • public class YarnConfigOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds configuration constants used by Flink's YARN runners.

    These options are not expected to be ever configured by users explicitly.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  YarnConfigOptions.UserJarInclusion 

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> APP_MASTER_RPC_ADDRESS
      The hostname or address where the application master RPC system is listening.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> APP_MASTER_RPC_PORT
      The port where the application master RPC system is listening.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> APPLICATION_ATTEMPTS
      Set the number of retries for failed YARN ApplicationMasters/JobManagers in high availability mode.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> APPLICATION_MASTER_PORT
      The config parameter defining the Akka actor system port for the ApplicationMaster and JobManager.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> APPLICATION_TAGS
      A comma-separated list of strings to use as YARN application tags.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> CLASSPATH_INCLUDE_USER_JAR
      Defines whether user-jars are included in the system class path for per-job-clusters as well as their positioning in the path.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> HEARTBEAT_DELAY_SECONDS
      The heartbeat interval between the Application Master and the YARN Resource Manager.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> MAX_FAILED_CONTAINERS
      The maximum number of failed YARN containers before entirely stopping the YARN session / job on YARN.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> PROPERTIES_FILE_LOCATION
      When a Flink job is submitted to YARN, the JobManager's host and the number of available processing slots is written into a properties file, so that the Flink client is able to pick those details up.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> VCORES
      The vcores exposed by YARN.

    • 字段详细资料

      • APP_MASTER_RPC_ADDRESS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> APP_MASTER_RPC_ADDRESS
        The hostname or address where the application master RPC system is listening.

      • APP_MASTER_RPC_PORT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> APP_MASTER_RPC_PORT
        The port where the application master RPC system is listening.

      • CLASSPATH_INCLUDE_USER_JAR

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> CLASSPATH_INCLUDE_USER_JAR
        Defines whether user-jars are included in the system class path for per-job-clusters as well as their positioning in the path. They can be positioned at the beginning ("FIRST"), at the end ("LAST"), or be positioned based on their name ("ORDER").

      • VCORES

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> VCORES
        The vcores exposed by YARN.

      • MAX_FAILED_CONTAINERS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> MAX_FAILED_CONTAINERS
        The maximum number of failed YARN containers before entirely stopping the YARN session / job on YARN. By default, we take the number of initially requested containers.

        Note: This option returns a String since Integer options must have a static default value.

      • APPLICATION_ATTEMPTS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> APPLICATION_ATTEMPTS
        Set the number of retries for failed YARN ApplicationMasters/JobManagers in high availability mode. This value is usually limited by YARN. By default, it's 1 in the standalone case and 2 in the high availability case.

        >Note: This option returns a String since Integer options must have a static default value.

      • HEARTBEAT_DELAY_SECONDS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> HEARTBEAT_DELAY_SECONDS
        The heartbeat interval between the Application Master and the YARN Resource Manager.

      • PROPERTIES_FILE_LOCATION

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> PROPERTIES_FILE_LOCATION
        When a Flink job is submitted to YARN, the JobManager's host and the number of available processing slots is written into a properties file, so that the Flink client is able to pick those details up. This configuration parameter allows changing the default location of that file (for example for environments sharing a Flink installation between users)

      • APPLICATION_MASTER_PORT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> APPLICATION_MASTER_PORT
        The config parameter defining the Akka actor system port for the ApplicationMaster and JobManager. The port can either be a port, such as "9123", a range of ports: "50100-50200" or a list of ranges and or points: "50100-50200,50300-50400,51234". Setting the port to 0 will let the OS choose an available port.

      • APPLICATION_TAGS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> APPLICATION_TAGS
        A comma-separated list of strings to use as YARN application tags.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • YarnConfigOptions

        private YarnConfigOptions()
        This class is not meant to be instantiated.
